response.original_title: Slow Cycling: Riding The Lost Lanes Of England - River Usk
response.overview: Best selling author and cycling enthusiast Jack Thurston takes pro mountain biker Blake Samson to the country roads of Wales. Away from Blakes usual fast and furious riding with his trademark tricks and flips, he experiences a slower ride. Following the river Usk this is a two day gentle caper through a rural landscape, learning about the local welsh history and embracing the lighter side of bike riding.
response.title: Slow Cycling: Riding The Lost Lanes Of England - River Usk

results.name: Slow Cycling Episode 2: Riding The Lost Lanes Of Britain
